# beget_compute_image (Resource)

Compute image resource. Manages custom VPS images created from instances or URLs.

## Example Usage
```terraform
resource "beget_compute_image" "from_instance" {
  name   = "example-image"
  region = "ru1"

  source = {
    instance_id       = "8838e90e-5bfd-4cc5-9edc-550135c83800"
    shutdown_instance = true
  }
}
```
```terraform
resource "beget_compute_image" "from_url" {
  name   = "example-image-from-url"
  region = "ru1"

  source = {
    url = "https://example.com/images/custom.qcow2"
  }
}
```
<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

> **NOTE**: [Write-only arguments](https://developer.hashicorp.com/terraform/language/resources/ephemeral#write-only-arguments) are supported in Terraform 1.11 and later.

- `name` (String) Image name
- `region` (String) Region where the image is stored. Changing this field will migrate the image
- `source` (Attributes, [Write-only](https://developer.hashicorp.com/terraform/language/resources/ephemeral#write-only-arguments)) Image source configuration (instance_id or url). Only one source type is allowed (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--source))

### Read-Only

- `disk_size_bytes` (String) Disk size in bytes
- `id` (String) Image ID
- `price` (Number) Storage price for the image
- `size_bytes` (String) Image size in bytes
- `status` (String) Image status (`CREATED`, `CREATING`, `CONVERTING`, `MIGRATING`, `ERROR`)

<a id="nestedatt--source"></a>
### Nested Schema for `source`

Optional:

- `instance_id` (String, [Write-only](https://developer.hashicorp.com/terraform/language/resources/ephemeral#write-only-arguments)) VPS instance ID used to create the image
- `shutdown_instance` (Boolean, [Write-only](https://developer.hashicorp.com/terraform/language/resources/ephemeral#write-only-arguments)) Stop VPS during image creation. Only valid with instance_id. VPS will be stopped if this attribute will not be defined in Terraform plan
- `url` (String, [Write-only](https://developer.hashicorp.com/terraform/language/resources/ephemeral#write-only-arguments)) Direct URL to the image file
